verses.1: “Job aw, tu-in ka thugen khempeuh limtakin hong ngai in.
verses.2: Ka lungsim sunga om thute a hong gen ding ka hi hi.
verses.3: Ka gen khempeuh lungsim takpi tawh ka gen hi a, a man thu a gen ka hi hi.
verses.4: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasianʼ kha in kei hong sawl a, Vanglian pa in kei tungah nuntakna hu hong pia hi.
verses.5: “Na hong dawn theih leh limtakin hong dawng in. Na hong seelna ding limtakin kiging in.
verses.6: Job aw, nang le kei, Pasianʼ hong muhna ah a kibang ihi a, i nih tuakin leivui pan a piang ihi hi.
verses.7: Tua ahih manin kei nong kihtak nading bangmah thu om lo a, nang ka hong zawhthawh bawl gawp nading zong bangmah thu om tuan lo hi.
verses.8: “Keima zakin thu na gen khin a, na thugente ka za khin hi.
verses.9: Nang in, ‘Kei ka mawh kei a, ka gamta khial kei hi. Ka paubaang kei a, mawhna ka su kha kei hi.
verses.10: Pasian in kei hong sukna ding thu zongzong a, gal bangin kei hong bawl hi.
verses.11: Amah in ka khe kol bulh a, ka gamtatna khempeuh hong encik hi,’ na cihna ka za hi.
verses.12: “Ahih hangin, Job aw, nangmah na khial zaw hi. Pasian pen mihing sangin lian zaw hi.
verses.13: Pasian in mihingteʼ phunna thudon ngei lo hi, ci-in thugenna tawh bang hangin Pasian mawhsak na hi hiam?
verses.14: Pasian in a lam tuamtuamin thu hong gengen napi-in, ama thugente khempeuh kuamah in thudon lo hi.
verses.15: Zanin mite a ihmut ciangin, mang le maangmuhna sungah Pasian in thu a gen hi.
verses.16: Pasian in thu hong gen a, ama hilhkholhna hangin mite lau mahmah uh hi.
verses.17: Mite in khialhna a bawl nawn lohna ding, mi kiphasakte a suahkhak loh nading, Pasian in a deihna hangin mite kiangah thu a gen hi.
verses.18: Pasian in mihingte siatna thuaksak lo a, sih nading panin amaute a hon khia hi.
verses.19: Pasian in cinatsakna tawh mihingte thuhilh a, a pumpi khempeuh natna tawh a kidimsak hi.
verses.20: Cina pa in an ne zo lo a, an lim pen nangawn a kih tha a suak hi.
verses.21: A ci a sa khempeuh kiam a, a guh guak bekin a om hi.
verses.22: A bei nading a nai hi ta a, misi gam a zuan ding hi ta hi.
verses.23: “Mihingteʼ tavuan a phawksak, Pasianʼ vantungmi tul tampite lak panin vantungmi khat amah a huh dingin hong paikhia ding hi.
verses.24: Vantungmi in amah a hehpihna hangin, ‘Amah suaktasak in. Misite gamah paisak kei in. Amah tatkhiat nading hih lai ah om hi,’ a ci ding hi.
verses.25: Tua ciangin ama pumpi khangno suakkikin, a thahat pen hun laitak a bangkik ding hi.
verses.26: Tua ciangin Pasian in ama thungetna pia dinga, amah in lungdamna tawh Pasian bia dinga, Pasian in ama adingin thu a hoih lamin a heisakkik ding hi.
verses.27: Tua ciangin amah in mihonpiteʼ zakna ah, ‘Kei ka khial khin hi. A manin ka gamta kei a, ahi zongin Pasian in kei hong suaktasak hi.
verses.28: Misiteʼ gam sung ka tun nading panin amah in kei hong kem a, tu-in kei ka nungta lai hi,’ a ci ding hi.
verses.29: Pasian in hih thute khempeuh mihingte tungah hong hihkik zelzel a,
verses.30: sih nading panin hon khiakik zelin nuntak nuam a piakik hi.
verses.31: “Job aw, ka thugente limtakin hong ngai in. Gamdai-in om inla, kei thu hong gensak in.
verses.32: Ahi zongin gen nop mahmah na neih leh hong gen in; bang hang hiam cih leh midik na hih ding ka hong deihsak hi.
verses.33: Ahi zongin gen nop velvel na neih khol kei leh keima thugen hong ngai in. Mipil na hih theih nading thu kong hilh ding hi,” a ci hi.
